input: I strongly disagree with this terrible take. The reasoning is flawed and the conclusion doesn't follow from the evidence at all.
This is absolutely infuriating. The airline lost my luggage for the third time this year. Can anyone recommend a better carrier?
Check out my new blog post about cooking Italian food from scratch. I spent all weekend perfecting the sauce.
That play was the worst thing I've ever seen on stage. Total waste of money and two hours of my life I'll never get back.
Would anyone be interested in a study group for the upcoming biology exam? I'm struggling with the genetics unit.
I'm so frustrated with this project. Nothing works and the documentation is garbage. But I'll figure it out eventually.
My grandmother's funeral was yesterday. Thank you all for the kind messages, it really means a lot during this difficult time.
You must have the IQ of a brick wall. Every single thing you post makes the rest of us dumber for having read it.
Of course someone like you would say that. Your kind always sticks together defending nonsense.
Do the world a favor and delete your account. Nobody would notice or care if you disappeared from here.
Wow, another brilliant contribution from the village fool. Keep talking so we can all keep laughing at you.
You're a joke and so is anyone who agrees with you. Absolute bottom of the barrel, the lot of you.
Maybe if you spent less time running your mouth and more time using your brain, you wouldn't embarrass yourself so often.
No one in their right mind would ever listen to you. You're the kind of person that makes everyone leave the room.
